item.title: 30 Things I Learned About Investing in 2020
item.description: Like most software developers and people in tech, I often experience imposter syndrome that reminds me of how little I actually know. For such imposters like me, it’s important to journal my reflections on what I am currently studying: finances and investments. That’s why I wrote my core “30 Things I learned about finance and investment in 2020.”
